newsitem.title: USA: Greyhound July passenger miles up.
newsitem.headline: Greyhound July passenger miles up.

text.p: NOTE: 1) All statistics are unaudited, in thousands unless otherwise noted, and are for Greyhound Lines Inc only. These statistics do not include the company's bus operating subsidiaries. Traffic information may differ from information previously reported due to continued refinements in the company's data analysis systems.

2) These statistics are for sales generated by 198 of the company's largest locations which electronically report sales. The same locations are used for 1997 and 1996 and represent about 72 and 73 percent, respectively, of total sales at Greyhound Lines, Inc. locations. The company's smaller locations may not show the same rate of growth in sales and passenger counts. It is necessary to adjust the sales totals for refunds, unredeemed tickets, interline activity and other miscellaneous items to reflect revenues and related statistics for financial statement purposes.
3) Includes all Greyhound Lines Inc locations. Does not include bus operating subsidiaries.
